definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Necklacing was also used to punish members of the black community who were perceived as collaborators with the apartheid regime.
sentences.chinese: 也用在黑人團體中和種族隔離政權勾結的成員身上。
這所學校完全取消種族隔離。

sentences.english: Mr Botha said President De Klerk's commitment to the abolition of apartheid was irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 總統對於廢除種族隔離的承諾是不會改變的。

sentences.english: Under apartheid they gave us a brick house.
sentences.chinese: 在種族隔離制度下，他們還讓我們住磚房。

sentences.english: We wish to desegregate all schools.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望在所有學校裏廢除種族隔離。

sentences.english: Which means a segregationist is breaking the law.
sentences.chinese: 種族隔離的意思是破壞法律的。

sentences.english: Employment opportunities are limited in the man's racially segregated neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 就業機會在他所在的種族隔離區確實有限。

sentences.english: The plans to desegregate the universities were met with opposition.
sentences.chinese: 在大學裏廢除種族隔離的計劃遭到了反對。

sentences.english: For nearly 40 years, Gordimer has spoken out against apartheid.
sentences.chinese: 接近40年了，戈迪默大聲控訴種族隔離政策。

sentences.english: They were tired to death of segregation and of being kicked around.
sentences.chinese: 他們十分厭惡種族隔離和總是被人踢來踢去。

sentences.english: The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP) helped families fight racial segregation laws.
sentences.chinese: 全國有色人種促進協會協助家屬們對抗種族隔離法。

sentences.english: The Government of South Africa is working hard on desegregation .
sentences.chinese: 南非政府很努力於廢止種族隔離。

sentences.english: The anti-apartheid movement was much bigger than one man.
sentences.chinese: 反種族隔離運動遠遠大於一個人。

sentences.english: and in South Africa, where the struggle of a courageous people defeated apartheid.
sentences.chinese: 在南非，人民通過英勇鬥爭廢除了種族隔離政策。

sentences.english: Mandatory racial separatism demeans human beings and forecloses on their life prospects.
sentences.chinese: 強制的種族隔離把人降格，消滅了他們對生活的期望。

sentences.english: Segregationists tried to preserve the South's traditional color barriers.
sentences.chinese: 種族隔離主義者試圖維護南方傳統的膚色壁壘。

pinyin: Da4 lian2 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2

definition: Brave New World, novel by Aldous Huxley 阿道司·赫胥黎[A1 dao4 si1 · He4 xu1 li2]
sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable
